statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_id = 1;
SELECT hand_id, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_width > 5;
SELECT hand_width, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_length DESC;
SELECT hand_id, hand_image FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_width < 3 AND hand_length > 4;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_width ASC, hand_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5 ORDER BY hand_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT hand_id, hand_length FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_width BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY hand_id ASC;
SELECT hand_id, hand_image FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length = 15 OR hand_width = 4.5 ORDER BY hand_length, hand_width;
SELECT DISTINCT hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length < 8 ORDER BY hand_length LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(hand_length) AS avg_length, MAX(hand_width) AS max_width FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY avg_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT hand_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_log WHERE authentication_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT finger_count FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE finger_count = 5;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5 ORDER BY hand_id ASC;
SELECT hand_id, hand_length, finger_count FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE finger_count >= 5 ORDER BY hand_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data JOIN authentication_log ON hand_geometry_data.hand_id = authentication_log.hand_id WHERE authentication_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY authentication_time DESC;
SELECT hand_id, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY hand_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(hand_length), MAX(finger_count) FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT hand_id, hand_measurement, hand_image FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT user_id, full_name, username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT hand_id, hand_image FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement @> '{"finger_length": 10}';
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryData;
SELECT hand_id, palm_width FROM HandGeometryData ORDER BY palm_width DESC;
SELECT hand_id, finger_length FROM HandGeometryData WHERE finger_length > 10;
SELECT AVG(palm_width) AS avg_width FROM HandGeometryData;
SELECT hand_id, hand_shape FROM HandGeometryData WHERE hand_shape LIKE '%round%' ORDER BY hand_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryData ORDER BY hand_id DESC;
SELECT palm_width, finger_length FROM HandGeometryData WHERE palm_width > 10 AND finger_length < 25;
SELECT hand_shape FROM HandGeometryData WHERE hand_shape LIKE '%square%' AND hand_shape NOT LIKE '%circle%';
SELECT * FROM UserAuth WHERE username = 'admin' AND password = 'password123';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM SecuritySettings ORDER BY setting_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryData;
SELECT user_id, hand_geometry FROM HandGeometryData;
SELECT * FROM UserAccess ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT log_id, access_time FROM HandGeometryLog LIMIT 5;
SELECT clearance_id, clearance_level FROM SecurityClearance WHERE clearance_level >= 3;
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryData ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM UserAccess WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM HandGeometryLog WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT clearance_id, clearance_level FROM SecurityClearance ORDER BY clearance_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryAudit WHERE audit_id BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
